    Alright people, school has started for me and that was why I was absent 
for so long. This whole Seconed in Command thing is very unacceptable. 
Quickstrike is my 2nd because Brightblade posts wonderfully, but not very 
often. Atma can do something else for me though. As for the battle right now, 
I have some major work to do first and then i will post.
